languages.text: "Проктор Адриана Йегер, аванпост T-M/255. Приветствуем Вольного Торговца". {n}К вам обращается седая женщина — совсем еще не старуха, но, видимо, ее жизнь была достаточно тяжелой, чтобы седина преждевременно тронула волосы.{/n}

"Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}The woman hailing you could hardly be called ancient, but it seems her life has been arduous enough to turn her hair grey well before its time.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Проктор Адриана Йегер, аванпост T-M/255. Приветствуем Вольного Торговца". {n}К вам обращается седая женщина — совсем еще не старуха, но, видимо, ее жизнь была достаточно тяжелой, чтобы седина преждевременно тронула волосы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}A woman addresses you who is hardly ancient, but whose life appears to have been arduous enough to turn her hair grey before its time.{/n}

"Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}A thin, gray-haired woman addresses you in a dry, featureless voice. She is hardly ancient, but something appears to have drained her of all colour and emotion, sparing the bare minimum necessary for duty.{/n}

"Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}The woman hailing you could hardly be called ancient, but it seems her life has been arduous enough to turn her hair grey well before its time.{/n}

"Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}The woman hailing you could hardly be called ancient, but it seems her life has been arduous enough to turn her hair grey well before its time.{/n}

"Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}The woman hailing you could hardly be called ancient, but it seems her life has been arduous enough to turn her hair grey well before its time.{/n}

"Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}The woman hailing you could hardly be called ancient, but it seems her life has been arduous enough to turn her hair grey well before its time.{/n}

"Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}A thin, grey-haired woman addresses you in a dry, featureless voice. She is hardly ancient, but something appears to have drained her of all colour and emotion, leaving only the bare minimum necessary to perform her duty.{/n}

"Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}A woman addresses you who is hardly ancient, but whose life appears to have been arduous enough to turn her hair grey before its time.{/n}

languages.text: «Procuradora Adriana Yeager, puesto avanzado T-M/255. Saludos, Comerciante Independiente». {n}Nadie llamaría anciana a la mujer que te saluda, pero parece que su vida ha sido tan dura como para volver su cabello gris mucho antes de tiempo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}The woman hailing you could hardly be called ancient, but it seems her life has been arduous enough to turn her hair grey well before its time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Procuradora Adriana Yeager, puesto avanzado T-M/255. Saludos, Comerciante Independiente». {n}Nadie llamaría anciana a la mujer que te saluda, pero parece que su vida ha sido tan dura como para volver su cabello gris mucho antes de tiempo.{/n}

«Procuradora Adriana Yeager, puesto avanzado T-M/255. Saludos, Comerciante Independiente». {n}Una mujer delgada de cabello gris te recibe con voz seca y neutral. Dista mucho de ser una anciana, pero parece que algo le ha arrebatado todo color y emoción, dejando solo el mínimo necesario para que cumpla su función.{/n}

languages.text: “阿德里亚娜·耶格尔监察官，T-M/255号哨站。向你致意，行商浪人。”{n}一位头发花白的女性向你致意。尽管她远远算不上年迈，但这里的生活似乎非常艰苦，她的头发已经熬白了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}The woman hailing you could hardly be called ancient, but it seems her life has been arduous enough to turn her hair grey well before its time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “阿德里亚娜·耶格尔监察官，T-M/255号哨站。向你致意，行商浪人。”{n}一位头发花白的女性向你致意。尽管她远远算不上年迈，但这里的生活似乎非常艰苦，她的头发已经熬白了。{/n}
“阿德里亚娜·耶格尔监察官，T-M/255号哨站。向你致意，行商浪人。”{n}一位头发花白、身材瘦削的女性以毫无起伏的音调开了口， 听起来干巴巴的。尽管她并不老迈，但似乎有什么东西耗尽了她所有的色彩与情感，只留下最低限度的生机，用来履行职责。{/n}
“阿德里亚娜·耶格尔监察官，T-M/255号哨站。向你致意，行商浪人。”{n}一位头发花白、身材瘦削的女性以毫无起伏的音调开了口， 听起来干巴巴的。尽管她并不老迈，但似乎有什么东西耗尽了她所有的色彩与情感，只留下最低限度的生机，用来履行职责。{/n}

languages.text: 「代理人アドリアナ・イェーガー、前哨基地T-M/255。こんにちは、ローグトレーダー」{n}声をかけてきた女性は決して老齢というわけではないが、その人生は相当に過酷だったのだろう。年齢に不釣り合いなほど白髪が多かった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}The woman hailing you could hardly be called ancient, but it seems her life has been arduous enough to turn her hair grey well before its time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「代理人アドリアナ・イェーガー、前哨基地T-M/255。こんにちは、ローグトレーダー」{n}声をかけてきた女性は決して老齢というわけではないが、その人生は相当に過酷だったのだろう。年齢に不釣り合いなほど白髪が多かった。{/n}
「代理人アドリアナ・イェーガー、前哨基地T-M/255。こんにちは、ローグトレーダー」{n}痩せた灰色の髪の女性が乾いた特徴のない声であなたに話しかける。彼女は年老いているとは言いがたいが、すべての色や感情が抜け落ちて、彼女の役割を果たすために必要最低限のものしか残っていないように見える。{/n}

languages.text: « Proctor Adriana Yeager, avant-poste T-M/255. Salutations, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. » {n}La femme qui s'adresse à vous n'est pas très âgée, mais il semblerait que sa vie ait été assez éprouvante pour que ses cheveux blanchissent de façon précoce.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}The woman hailing you could hardly be called ancient, but it seems her life has been arduous enough to turn her hair grey well before its time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Proctor Adriana Yeager, avant-poste T-M/255. Salutations, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. » {n}La femme qui s'adresse à vous n'est pas très âgée, mais il semblerait que sa vie ait été assez éprouvante pour que ses cheveux blanchissent de façon précoce.{/n}

« Proctor Adriana Yeager, avant-poste T-M/255. Salutations, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. » {n}Une femme élancée aux cheveux grisonnants s'adresse à vous d'une voix sèche et monocorde. Elle est encore relativement jeune, mais quelque chose semble l'avoir vidée de sa substance et de ses émotions pour ne laisser dans son sillage que le strict minimum nécessaire à sa mission.{/n}

languages.text: "Karakol T-M/255'ten ben Üsteğmen Adriana Yeager. Selamlar Hür Tacir." {n}Seni selamlayan kadın pek de yaşlı olmasa da hayatı, saçlarını erkenden ağartacak kadar zorlu geçmiş gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}The woman hailing you could hardly be called ancient, but it seems her life has been arduous enough to turn her hair grey well before its time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Karakol T-M/255'ten ben Üsteğmen Adriana Yeager. Selamlar Hür Tacir." {n}Seni selamlayan kadın pek de yaşlı olmasa da hayatı, saçlarını erkenden ağartacak kadar zorlu geçmiş gibi görünüyor.{/n}

"Karakol T-M/255'ten ben Üsteğmen Adriana Yeager. Selamlar Hür Tacir." {n}Zayıf, kır saçlı bir kadın; ruhsuz bir ses tonuyla sana hitap ediyor. Kadın pek de yaşlı değil ancak görünüşe göre bir şey, içindeki tüm hayat enerjisini sömürmüş ve geriye bir tek görevini ifa etmek için zaruri olan asgari unsurlar kalmış.{/n}

languages.text: "Proktorin Adriana Yeager, Außenposten T-M/255. "Ich grüße Euch, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Die Frau, die dich begrüßt, lässt sich schwerlich als alt bezeichnen, aber ihr Leben scheint schwierig genug gewesen zu sein, um ihr Haar frühzeitig ergrauen zu lassen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Proctor Adriana Yeager, outpost T-M/255. Greetings, Rogue Trader." {n}The woman hailing you could hardly be called ancient, but it seems her life has been arduous enough to turn her hair grey well before its time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Proktorin Adriana Yeager, Außenposten T-M/255. "Ich grüße Euch, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}." {n}Die Frau, die dich begrüßt, lässt sich schwerlich als alt bezeichnen, aber ihr Leben scheint schwierig genug gewesen zu sein, um ihr Haar frühzeitig ergrauen zu lassen.{/n}

"Proktorin Adriana Yeager, Außenposten T-M/255. "Ich grüße Euch, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. {n}Eine hagere Frau mit grauem Haar begrüßt dich mit ausdrucksloser Stimme. Sie ist eigentlich nicht alt, aber irgendetwas scheint ihr jede Farbe und Emotion geraubt und nur das Minimum dessen zurückgelassen zu haben, das sie braucht, um ihre Pflicht zu erfüllen.{/n}
